original_text: The women who had come with Jesus from Galilee followed Joseph. They saw the place where the hole in the rock was. They also saw Joseph put Jesus' body into the empty hole.
korean_text: 갈릴리에서 예수와 함께 온 여자들이 뒤를 따라 그 무덤과 그의 시체를 어떻게 두었는지를 보고

sentences.original_text: The women who had come with Jesus from Galilee
where the hole in the rock was
They also saw Joseph put Jesus' body
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 요셉이 예수님의 시신을 넣는 것을 보았습니다
